entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the people walking through the hall with George.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of the people walking through the hall with Fred.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as making an impression at the Slytherin table.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as walking into the entrance hall with laughter following him.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as panting and suggesting a shortcut to North Tower.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as peering down the empty passage to suggest a direction.

entities.name: north tower
entities.description: North Tower is mentioned as the destination of their journey through the castle.

entities.name: slytherin table
entities.description: Slytherin table is mentioned as a location where Malfoy made an impression.

entities.name: entrance hall
entities.description: Entrance hall is mentioned as the place where Harry walked in with laughter following him.

relationships.description: Fred and George are walking together through the hall.
Malfoy is making an impression at the Slytherin table.
Harry walked into the entrance hall with laughter following him.
Ron is suggesting a shortcut to North Tower.
Hermione is peering down the empty passage to suggest a direction.
